page.title: 07Parbold Hilldale Trade
page.content: The Hilldale post office serves the whole area of 600 people.In addition to the postal facilities,weekly pensions and allowances are paid out.There is a counter selling food and general goods, this is the only shop in the area apart from Bells' Antique shop.There is a daily delivery to houses in the area by a ROYAL MAIL van,and 2 collections of letters from post boxes in the area.The only garage is a petrol and service station on the common,Parbold. Cornthwaites on the main road in Bispham sell agricultural machinery. Fairfield Dalton is a small light industry using premises at the back of the Community centre.They buy,sell and refurbish stainless steel tanks and processing machinery for the food industry.2 local people have been employed for 6 months.A play area with equipment is in front of the centre
